title: Fresh Muesli
ingredients: ['100g porridge oats', '50g oat bran', '4 tablespoons wheatgerm', '4 tablespoons chopped mixed nuts', '4 tablespoons mixed dried fruit', '125ml fruit juice or milk', '1 small green apple, grated', 'fresh fruit, diced', '4 tablespoons natural yoghurt', 'honey as needed']
